title: Trying to intimidate a police officer
context: Aggressively challenge a cop who is trying to arrest or ticket you.

content.bestLine: You can't do this, I know my rights

informal.text: Come on, officer, give me a break
What's the big deal, it's just a ticket
I don't think you understand the situation
Can we talk about this somewhere else
I'm not going anywhere until you explain
This is ridiculous, I'm calling my lawyer

slang.text: Chill out, cop, I got this
You're just trying to hassle me, right
I'm good, I don't need no ticket

sarcastic.text: Oh great, just what I needed, a ticket
Thanks for ruining my day, officer

rude.text: Back off, cop, I'm not afraid of you
You can't touch me, I know the law
This is a waste of time, let me go

patterns.template: I'm not going to [options] until you [options]

dialogs.description: Confronting a police officer during a traffic stop

lines.speaker: Officer
lines.text: You were speeding, license and registration please

lines.speaker: Driver
lines.text: I don't think I was speeding, this is a trap

dialogs.description: Arguing with a police officer during an arrest

lines.speaker: Officer
lines.text: Turn around and put your hands behind your back

lines.speaker: Suspect
lines.text: I'm not going anywhere, you can't arrest me
